title: பீட்டில்ஜூசில் ஏன் குமிழ்கள் உருவாகின்றன | Why do Convective Cells form in Betelgeuse in Tamil?
description: A convection zone, convective zone or convective region of a star is a layer which is unstable to convection. Energy is primarily or partially transported by convection in such a region. In a radiation zone, energy is transported by radiation and conduction. Stellar convection consists of mass movement of plasma within the star which usually forms a circular convection current with the heated plasma ascending and the cooled plasma descending.
